moves.name: Can’t Stop Us!
moves.effect: Removes all status conditions from the user. Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk. Raises the user’s accuracy.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.effect: Sharply lowers the user’s Sp. Atk.

passives.name: Stat Leech 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of lowering the target’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful. Raises the user’s stat by the same amount.

passives.name: Good Night-mare 5
passives.description: Powers up moves when the target is asleep.

passives.name: Go Viral 9
passives.description: When a status move is used to inflict a status condition on an opponent, inflicts the same status condition on all opposing sync pairs.
